name: Reads-Rural Education And Development Society
briefDescription: READS Rural Education And Development Society is a registered voluntary organization involved in the education, health and rural development activities in Tiruvannamalai district 7 young professional and like-minded people joined together and started this organization since 1992. It is registered under Tamil Nadu societies Registration Act. It is mainly focusing on ‘empowerment of the people in remote rural villages of Tiruvannamalai Dt.
